itemDescription: David A. Sackler Professor of Pharmacology at Yale University where he co-directs the Cancer Biology Institute with Joseph Schlessinger

wikipedia_page.main: Mark Andrew Lemmon  (born 1964) an English-born biochemist, is a professor of Pharmacology at Yale University where he co-directs the Cancer Biology Institute with Joseph Schlessinger and serves as Associate Director for Basic Science of Yale Cancer Center.
